body: The Red State Gathering in Atlanta  may have disinvited Donald Trump after his disparaging remarks about Megyn Kelly.  But the Trump phenomenon is very much on the minds of the conservative activists there.
description: The Red State Gathering in Atlanta  may have disinvited Donald Trump after his disparaging remarks about Megyn Kelly.  But the Trump phenomenon is very much on the minds of the conservative activists there.
title: Despite Disinvite, Trump Dominates GOP Confab
